participant_2.background:
I'll be making a batch of organic cat food for my kitty.
my favorite book is enders game.
My moped is the envy of everyone on my block because it's so colorful and unique.
i have a dog and we go for walks.
i just graduated college with my bachelors degree in education.

content.text: Hey whats up
Not much, just finished making a batch of organic cat food.
Oh wow, thats awesome! I love animals. I have a dog named Charlie.
Thats cool, I love dogs too. What kind of dog is Charlie?
Hes a beagle. What kind of cat do you have?
A tortie. She's really sweet.
I love tortie cats, they're so cute.
They are! What's your favorite book?
Enders Game. It's such a good book.
I've heard good things about it. I'm actually in the middle of reading a book about education right now.
Oh cool, what's it called?
It's called "The Education of Sonny Carson." It's about a guy who grew up in the ghetto and became a successful activist and community leader.
Wow, that sounds really interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good. So, what do you do for work?
I'm a medical assistant at a doctor's office.
Oh cool, that must be interesting.
It is! I get to learn a lot about different medical conditions and treatments.
That's awesome. How do you like it?
I love it! I'm really glad I got into this field.
That's great to hear. I'm sure you're a great medical assistant.
Thanks
